modName: Snow Elf Helmet Open Male Humans or Elves
summary: male retextured ebony Helmet that goes with the Ancient Falmer Armor.
descriptionHtml:
Based on the mesh of ebony helmet made by Improved Closed Faced Helmets by Navida1
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15927
And the base diffuse of Craftable Ancient Falmer Armor with Weapons by SONNYSPAK
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21992

Forged under elven : 1 refined moonstone, 1 mamoth tusk, 1 frost salts, 2 leather
Upgrade: 1 fire salts, 1 frost salts.
Ebony armor perks needed.

Retextured for the Ancient Falmer armor.
Male humans-elves only.
Does not have a matching set yet
Beard Clipping possible. Thanks to steve40 for trying to fix this. (Work in progress)

steve40\'s mods:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3463396

optional base on Open Faced Helmets by MadCat221
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4866


Manual Installation:

You can have all of them just click no to replace mod and yes to all afterwards.

Go to NMM and click on add mod from file (the puzzle bit with the plus sign button at the upper left corner). Find the folder where you\'ve put the downloaded .rar file (preferably a SkyrimMods folder), click on it and then click Open. Then activate. Run the Installer of TESVSkyrim and then hit play.
If you have skse installed, rather than hit play, exit the installer and double click the skse.exe.

Thanks to bethesda for this epic game and to the release of the creation kit.
Thanks to all the modders who inspired me to start modding too,
especialy to steve40 from the forums for scripting the BeardClipping fix

Please visit my other mods too. Don\'t forget to endorse.
author: jetfalmer
